verses.verse: Give <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>; and <S%H5956>hide<s%> not yourself from my <S%H8467>supplication<s%>.
<S%H7181>Attend<s%> unto <S%H6030>me<s%>, and hear <S%H7300>me<s%>: I mourn in my <S%H7879>complaint<s%>, and make a <S%H1949>noise<s%>;

Because of the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>, <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H6125>oppression<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>: for they <S%H4131>cast<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> upon <S%H639>me<s%>, and in wrath they hate <S%H7852>me<s%>.
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is severely <S%H2342>pained<s%> <S%H7130>inside<s%> <S%H367>me<s%>: and the terrors of <S%H4194>death<s%> are fallen upon <S%H5307>me<s%>.
<S%H3374>Fearfulness<s%> and <S%H7461>trembling<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H6427>me<s%>, and horror has overwhelmed <S%H3680>me<s%>.
And I <S%H559>said<s%>, Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> I had <S%H83>wings<s%> like a <S%H3123>dove<s%>! for then would I fly <S%H5774>away<s%>, and be at <S%H7931>rest<s%>.
<S%H5074>Behold<s%>, then would I wander far <S%H7368>off<s%>, and <S%H3885>remain<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
I would <S%H2363>hasten<s%> my <S%H4655>escape<s%> from the <S%H7307>windy<s%> <S%H5584>storm<s%> and <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%>.
<S%H1104>Destroy<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, and <S%H6385>divide<s%> their <S%H3956>tongues<s%>: for I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H7379>strife<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%>.
<S%H3119>Day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> they go <S%H5437>about<s%> it upon the <S%H2346>walls<s%> <S%H205>there<s%>: mischief also and <S%H5999>sorrow<s%> are in the middle of <S%H7130>it<s%>.
<S%H1942>Wickedness<s%> is in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> <S%H8496>there<s%>: deceit and <S%H4820>guile<s%> <S%H4185>depart<s%> not from her <S%H7339>streets<s%>.

For it was not a <S%H341>enemy<s%> that <S%H2778>reproached<s%> <S%H5375>me<s%>; then I could have borne <S%H8130>it<s%>: neither was it he that hated me that did <S%H1431>magnify<s%> himself against <S%H5641>me<s%>; then I would have hid myself from him:
But it was <S%H582>you<s%>, a man my <S%H6187>equal<s%>, my <S%H441>guide<s%>, and my <S%H3045>acquaintance<s%>.
We took <S%H4985>sweet<s%> <S%H5475>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, and <S%H1980>walked<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H7285>company<s%>.

Let <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H5377>seize<s%> upon <S%H3381>them<s%>, and let them go down <S%H2416>quickly<s%> into <S%H7585>hell<s%>: for <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is in their <S%H4033>dwellings<s%>, and among <S%H7130>them<s%>.
As for <S%H7121>me<s%>, I will call upon <S%H430>God<s%>; and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall save <S%H3467>me<s%>.
<S%H6153>Evening<s%>, and <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and at <S%H6672>noon<s%>, will I <S%H7878>pray<s%>, and cry <S%H1993>aloud<s%>: and he shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>.
He has <S%H6299>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%> from the <S%H7128>battle<s%> that was against <S%H7227>me<s%>: for there were many with me.

<S%H410>God<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and <S%H6030>afflict<s%> <S%H3427>them<s%>, even he that stays of <S%H6924>old<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>. Because they have no <S%H2487>changes<s%>, therefore they <S%H3372>fear<s%> not <S%H430>God<s%>.
He has put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> against such as be at <S%H7965>peace<s%> with <S%H2490>him<s%>: he has broken his <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

The words of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> were <S%H2505>smoother<s%> than <S%H4260>butter<s%>, but <S%H7128>war<s%> was in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>: his <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H7401>softer<s%> than <S%H8081>oil<s%>, yet were they drawn <S%H6609>swords<s%>.

<S%H7993>Cast<s%> your <S%H3053>burden<s%> upon the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and he shall <S%H3557>sustain<s%> <S%H5769>you<s%>: he shall never <S%H5414>allow<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> to be <S%H4131>moved<s%>.

But <S%H430>you<s%>, O God, shall bring them <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H875>pit<s%> of <S%H7845>destruction<s%>: <S%H1818>bloody<s%> and <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> shall not live out <S%H2673>half<s%> their <S%H3117>days<s%>; but I will trust in <S%H982>you<s%>.
